Title: Living Memory Round Screw-Top Floating Glass Locket Body Chain / Bikini / Belly
Description: Round Screw-Top Reversible Glass Locket Body ChainStainless Steel Flat Cable Chain Put anything you want in this locket to make it your own! Awesome one of a kind body chain! This piece features a round living memory floating glass locket centerpiece that screws to open and close. The reversible pendant has stainless steel casing can be worn to shown the sleek metal frame or the white rhinestoned frame. The locket pendant measures about 1 1/8" in diameter (28.6 mm) and 1/4" in depth (6.4 mm). The body of the vest is made with a high quality stainless steel flat cable link chain that measures 2 mm thick--it is dainty and delicate looking, yet very durable (links of the chain are soldered closed). The neck loop is 24" (60.1 cm) and each side piece is approximately 31" (78.7 cm). The chain connects at the back of the neck with a lobster clasp. This body chain is made as 'one size fits most.' Feel free to message with questions or to request additional photos. Thank you for looking!
